content.question: ​The functions <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> are given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 4 to the power of open parentheses 5 x minus 1 close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>4</mn><mfenced><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 8 to the power of open parentheses x divided by 4 close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>8</mn><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>/</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. When solving the equation  <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals g open parentheses x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, the functions can be rewritten in equivalent forms so that the equation can be solved without the use of technology. Which of the following are equivalent definitions of <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> that aid in solving <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals g open parentheses x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> without the use of technology?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 2 to the power of open parentheses log subscript 2 4 times open parentheses 5 x minus 1 close parentheses close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mn>4</mn><mo>·</mo><mfenced><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 2 to the power of open parentheses log subscript 2 8 times open parentheses x divided by 4 close parentheses close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mn>8</mn><mo>·</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>/</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 2 to the power of open parentheses log subscript 2 8 times open parentheses 5 x minus 1 close parentheses close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mn>8</mn><mo>·</mo><mfenced><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 2 to the power of open parentheses log subscript 2 4 times open parentheses x divided by 4 close parentheses close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mn>4</mn><mo>·</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>/</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 4 to the power of open parentheses log subscript 2 4 times open parentheses 5 x minus 1 close parentheses close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>4</mn><mfenced><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mn>4</mn><mo>·</mo><mfenced><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 8 to the power of open parentheses log subscript 2 8 times open parentheses x divided by 4 close parentheses close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>8</mn><mfenced><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mn>8</mn><mo>·</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>/</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 2 times 4 to the power of open parentheses log subscript 2 4 times open parentheses 5 x minus 1 close parentheses close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>4</mn><mfenced><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mn>4</mn><mo>·</mo><mfenced><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 8 to the power of open parentheses log subscript 2 8 times open parentheses x divided by 4 close parentheses close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>8</mn><mfenced><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mn>8</mn><mo>·</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>/</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 2 to the power of open parentheses log subscript 2 4 times open parentheses 5 x minus 1 close parentheses close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mn>4</mn><mo>·</mo><mfenced><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 2 to the power of open parentheses log subscript 2 8 times open parentheses x divided by 4 close parentheses close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mn>8</mn><mo>·</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>/</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

topic.text: 2.13: Exponential and Logarithmic Equations and Inequalities

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
